description: Try our easy to follow Oriental Rice Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Rice salad,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Rice,Chicken,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Oriental Rice Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 small naturally sweet pineapple, peeled, diced
1 handful kaffir lime leaves, spine removed, finely shredded
2 lime wedges, cut into wedges (save 4 wedges to serve)
4 cup medium grain white rice, cooled

recipeInstructions.text: Place rice into a bowl. Whisk lime juice, fish sauce and sugar together. Add lime leaves and chilli.
Pour over rice and toss through with a fork. Add chicken, pineapple, snow peas, spring onion and capsicum.
Spoon into bowls. garnish with herbs. Serve with lime wedges.
